summary: This is an email chain from November 2020, forwarding a March 2020 exchange between FBI agents and a prosecutor regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The discussion centers on identifying and contacting a potential witness, a former Interlochen student whose camp tuition was paid by Epstein, who had been interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with Maxwell and Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the person who paid the summer camp tuition for a student at Interlochen, making him a central figure in the financial connection being investigated.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Epstein in the context of records received and as someone the potential witness had dealings with, according to a podcast interview.

connections.description: Both are subjects of the investigation, and records pertaining to both were received from Interlochen. They are linked through the financial support of a student.

events.title: FBI email discussion about potential witness
events.description: FBI agents and a prosecutor exchange emails about a former Interlochen student whose camp tuition was paid by Epstein. They discuss her podcast interview and plan to contact her for an interview.

events.title: Podcast interview of potential witness
events.description: A former Interlochen student, whose tuition was paid by Epstein, is interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein paid the summer camp tuition for a specific student at Interlochen, creating a financial link to a potential witness.
The FBI and prosecutors were actively seeking to interview this former student in March 2020 after she discussed her dealings with Epstein and Maxwell on a podcast.
The email chain shows investigative coordination, with an agent traveling to Aruba and planning to follow up upon return.
The document references attached records from Interlochen covering 1994-98 related to Epstein, Maxwell, and student rosters.
